Solar Charging: Invest in a portable solar panel charger for your phone and other devices. This will allow you to recharge without electricity.
Gas Cooking: If you have a gas stove or a gas oven, you can use them for cooking during an electricity outage.
Candlelight: Have candles and matches or a lighter on hand to provide light and warmth.
Fireplace or Wood Stove: If you have a fireplace or wood stove, use it to heat your home and cook food.
Portable Heating: Invest in a portable heating pad or a portable heater to keep warm.
